00034 class RealMatrix2 {
00035     
00036 private:
00037     
00038     Vector data_;
00039     int row_, col_;
00040     
00041     
00042     class RangeViolation : public exception { };
00043     
00044 public:
00045     
00046     RealMatrix2(int , int );
00047     RealMatrix2();
00048     RealMatrix2(const RealMatrix2 &);
00049     
00050     void range_check(int i, int  j) const;
00051     
00052     double operator ()(int i,int j) const ;
00053     
00054     void operator ()(int i , int j , double value);
00055

00057     
00058

00061 
00062 inline void RealMatrix2::range_check(int i, int j) const {
00063     if ( ((i < 0) && (i> row_)) || ((j < 0) && (j > col_))  )
00064         THROW(RealMatrix2::RangeViolation());
00065 }
00066 inline double RealMatrix2::operator()(int i, int j) const {
00067     range_check(i, j);
00068     return data_.component((row_) + (i*col_ + j));
00069 }
00070 
00071 inline void RealMatrix2::operator ()(int i, int j , double value){
00072     range_check(i, j);
00073     data_.component((row_) + (i*col_ + j))=value;
00074 }
